properties.name: kyrie.tokens.common.issuer
properties.description: Default issuer claim value that will be added as ISSUER claim to JWT(or any) token.

properties.name: kyrie.tokens.jwt.secret.key
properties.description: Secret key that will be used to sign in the jwt token.

properties.name: kyrie.oauth2.consent.page.enabled
properties.description: If true, then user will be redirected to consent page after login to confirm access. Otherwise, no consent page will be shown and access will be granted without consent page.

properties.name: kyrie.oauth2.auth.remember-me.enabled
properties.description: Determine should be user be remembered after the authentication.
